website_summaries.verdict: Tall vessel faucet will give you a striking look in any sink in your home.
pros: Faucet offered in brushed nickel, chrome, or oil rubbed bronze finishes
Contains a swivel spout so it can work in any direction
Ships with multiple accessories, including a matching pop-up drain
Gives you a good flow rate for all kinds of tasks
cons: The spout height is 9 inches tall, which some won't like

customer_reviews.title: very good faucets.
customer_reviews.text: excellent faucets. first one took an hour second 1/2 hour. quiet good flow look great.
customer_reviews.author: brent

customer_reviews.title: Price does not reflect quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Went to Home Depot, Rona, Lowe’s and not one would give me the time of day to look for something like this. Just go on line to our website and buy it there. So I did and I am glad I found MYHB. This fits perfectly with the decor I was going for and this thing is solid! At first I was worried it might be something cheep, not this unit. I would buy this again, I wish they had a bigger selection so I could buy more for my other 2 bathrooms. Tap amazing , price amazing, you can’t go wrong on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value and Quality
customer_reviews.text: SUPERB QUALITY AND ELEGANT LOOKS. I was skeptical about this purchase. Price is literally half as compared to local major stores. I purchased this item from a local store and will be returning it tomorrow. Simply easily to install . I actually did it by myself. Would highly recommend this. Thank you !!
customer_reviews.author: AZLAM B

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We had to replace our old faucet in the guest bath that had broken so I was looking for something inexpensive that would get here quickly on Amazon prime. I was very happy to see the quality of this faucet. The handyman I had install it said it was designed very well and was made a very good materials. It was very easy to install and it looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail H.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and elegant
customer_reviews.text: I really love this faucet and drain. Unfortunately the drain was too big for my basin, but that was my fault for not checking before hand. They are beautiful looking, sturdy and operate well, perfect for a vessel sink basin.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality & Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My plumber only uses Moen and Delta. But he said this is a very good quality faucet. I love the style and swivel design. The height is adjustable. The tallest height is perfect for my semi recessed vessel sink. Does not splash.
customer_reviews.author: zapp

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye to expensive brands. See update
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for my master bath remodel. Reluctant at first due to price and no brand name. Wow, I am impressed with the building quality and included horses. Nothing cheap here. If all MYHB products are this good I'm a lifelong customer. 1-21-2020: still love these faucets. No issues at all w them. Its been over 2 yrs since installed. Solid product IMO.
customer_reviews.author: MBar

customer_reviews.title: Very nice faucets!
customer_reviews.text: Very happily surprised with these faucets. I was worried about their robustness when I unpacked them, but they look great installed and function perfectly. We'll see about longevity. I've certainly spent a lot more only to be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Helms

customer_reviews.title: Great color, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great color, great price. Exactly what we wanted for our remodeled bathroom with dark faucets. We converted a small cabinet into a sink fixture so we were working with limited counter space and this faucet worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Carlie

customer_reviews.title: Great faucet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our renovated bathroom. Works great and have not had any issues with leaking. Easy install. Definitely like that you can move the faucet left and right to rinse out the vessel sink. I prefer the mobility vs. a vessel sink faucet that is stationary. Purchased two of the brushed nickel faucets and they continue to work great after a year of usage in our main bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels41

customer_reviews.title: More than satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: The faucet was ordered through Amazon, and I was amazed at how quickly the item arrived at my home. I had priced similar faucets in Guadalajara, Mexico and found them to cot twice what I paid at MYHB, and that price also included FedEx to Mexico. The faucet has been installed in my new rustic style bathroom that has an onyx sink atop a slab of wood from a tree trunk I used to make a free standing/floating vanity top--perfect! Thank you, MYHB ans Amazon. Helena Romero, Mexico
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Romero

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked out great for my DIY vanity. Turned an ugly dresser into this beautiful vanity. Bought a vessel sink and this faucet/drain. Matched up and fit perfect. Happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Schwab

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be a fairly heavy, well machined, nicely finished, and solid faucet for this price point. Nice that it includes flexible hoses and matching drain. This is alot of stuff for the price. I put it in a seldom used powder room. If it doesn't leak down the road I'll consider it a really good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Great faucet easy install fast shipping very heavy and well built. We refinished a old dresser to go into our 1/2 bath saw some we really didn’t like at the box stores for 5-6 times as much money. It has been installed for a few weeks now no leaks, no drips, no hard water spray splashing out of the sink as mentioned in a few other reviews. I expect to get several years of good use with the same performance. If something does happen I will post again but for now my wife and I are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Faucet
customer_reviews.text: Love this faucet. It can be adjusted to a lower setting. Came with drain. Came with all parts. Didn't have to run to the hardware store for anything extra. It works great, looks fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: JANIN

customer_reviews.title: The quality combined with the price is spectacular!
customer_reviews.text: I had remodeled my guest bath quite some time with vessel sinks and the high bronze oiled faucets. Each faucet was almost $400. One went bad! Discontinued. Couldn't be fixed so I looked up these on Amazon and bought a matching pair, keeping my good original one if someone needed a replacement. My handyman installed them and the quality was exactly the same as the hugely expensive ones. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: jody85259

customer_reviews.title: Easy install. 3/8 water supply hook up.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and set up. Has 3/8 hose hookup. Most newer modern houses have 1/2” water supply hoses. If you need to hook up to 1/2”, get a 1/2” npt, to 3/8 compression fitting. Just throw away the compression part. If you try regular pipe 1/2”-3/8” reducer, the 3/8 Faucet water supply Hoses will not thread on. Hopefully this saves you a trip to the hardware store. Otherwise, easy hook up.
customer_reviews.author: YAY2A!

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: This smfaucet was fine until the end. Water sprays out spout because there was no washer. Why was there not washer for the spout?
customer_reviews.author: T W Deans

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a vessel sink
customer_reviews.text: I searched the local stores for a faucet that would work with my vessel sink to no avail. All the ones I finally found this online and was very excited to see that it was perfect when I opened the box. It is now installed and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Great statement piece for your bath.
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is beautiful!! I put a vessel sink on a re-purposed dresser and the style and color add so much to my master bath decor. The price was excellent!
customer_reviews.author: NikkiVF

customer_reviews.title: MYHB Swivel bathroom single lever faucet
customer_reviews.text: Looks great works great installed easily. Really like with our vessel sink. Brushed nickel finish matches well too.
customer_reviews.author: Deb SC

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice well made. Feels heavy and built to last. Smooth handle operation. And water delivery is just fine for us. Pleased with this faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Wood

customer_reviews.title: most of it is very good but the very top part which is the handle ...
customer_reviews.text: most of it is very good but the very top part which is the handle that moves up to open faucet, does not stay screwed. becomes loose and keeps needing adjusting every other day.
customer_reviews.author: Israel Lima

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Was nervous because I looked for something light on the pocketbook. But this turned out to be just as good as any other faucet. And I have a 600$ plus faucet upstairs in shower...same quality.
customer_reviews.author: McMirv

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty n economical...
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price...looks really nice... Wish we could have use in our walk-in shower...big mistake...this is so nice beat the large hardware stores...
customer_reviews.author: GRANNYLYN

customer_reviews.title: It was pretty straight forward no issues
customer_reviews.text: I thought the value was great and it came with everything we needed to install in our new sink. We purchased the sink/faucet all together. It made it easier to be certain we had the correct size drain.
customer_reviews.author: LmBrown

customer_reviews.title: Easy going seller AND product
customer_reviews.text: This was THE best faucet and it looks great in my mother’s bathroom. It came quick and it was easy to install. I had questions for the seller and he got back to me right away! I definitely recommend this product AND this seller!! Life is so much easier when it’s easy! ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Davisbrand

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice - poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Faucet lever not centered. Cold all the way to the right - hot centered with faucet spout. Will not go left past center of spout. Threads would not tighten - broken. So virtually worthless. Doing remodel and bought before ready to install - now out of return window. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JDR

customer_reviews.title: Love this faucet!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't installed it yet. Waiting for vanity. Love the look and feel of it.
customer_reviews.author: Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great, installs easily. But water tastes bad.
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this item including the drain is great except it has one pretty serious flaw. The water out of it tastes like rubber. Like an old Army water bladder. Practically undrinkable. I put Dawn detergent in the lines and let it soak overnight, then ran it for 10 minutes. No help. Is there anything we can do about this? I doubt this is normal for your product. Thank you in advance for your thought and response. - Roy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: no overflow
customer_reviews.text: did not install because listing said it had an overflow but it did not....it has been returned I did receive a note that the incorrect info on the overflow was going to be corrected
customer_reviews.author: William S. Kossack

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality...
customer_reviews.text: I've installed the faucet without any issues. Rarely used and it started to leak on the top part of it. Not sure what's wrong with it but I have used this faucet maybe 1 times every two 2 weeks just for a few minutes, without any dramatic movement of the top port. Price seemed good but you get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need to replace drain stopper and cannot find
customer_reviews.text: The drain stopper spring broke after less than a year of use.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Cozza

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive and installed easily.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! Really topped off the look of my vessel sink and it's just beautiful. Plumbers installed it easily. A great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: lovemygirl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is just beautiful. Great quality. It is so pretty on my vintage dresser that was turned into a vanity- used an egg shaped white porcelain bowl that too came from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: janab

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: So far so good the faucet works great and above all looks expensive and beautiful. Definitely considering buying another for my guest bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Kassidy Reynoso

customer_reviews.title: Solidly made faucet, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is very well made solid brass. I like that it swivels and the height is adjustable. The first one that was sent to me was screwed on too tightly, and I couldn't get the base off to adjust the height. I emailed MYBH and they gave me some suggestions. When that didn't work, they mailed me a new faucet in just a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: VK

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and lovely to look at! Love the way the water flows out! Great flow!
customer_reviews.author: Larry E. Jester

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, parts assembled easily, it came with the water supply lines and the drain and plug were perfect! Exactly what we needed for out project.
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: Missing plate, other wise very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, just what I wantes, one handle, easy cleaning. Problem is the plate for 3 hole sink not in package. Needing to contact seller, bummber!
customer_reviews.author: Cereza

customer_reviews.title: They arrived quickly and are beautiful. They feel heavy and work perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 5 of these. They arrived quickly and are beautiful. They feel heavy and work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I love this faucet. Not only beautifully made, but very high quality at a great price. Thank you for such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: dmb in tampa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Very solid and beautiful! Excellent value - shopped around some bath supply stores and the same faucets were hundreds of dollars. This was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Falcone

customer_reviews.title: Love this faucet
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, price and it looks fantastic. I like that you could adjust the height and the fact that it swivels..Bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Anne J

customer_reviews.title: If your countertop is thick the shank may not be long enough.
customer_reviews.text: I love the faucet, but the manufacturer does not offer an extension shank, and the threads are specific to the brand. My plumber had to have one made to fit so it would go though my concrete countertop. This was not an issue with the BWE brand faucets I purchased through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn J Lathrop

customer_reviews.title: Many compliments
customer_reviews.text: WE got two of these for our vessel sinks in the main bathroom.....everyone compliments us on them. We love these!
customer_reviews.author: K.W. Minneapolis

customer_reviews.title: Great value and look.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these for my bathroom remodel. They are beautiful and work great. I love them so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra B. Brown

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these faucets for my double vanity. They were the same faucets but the color did not match at all. They looked totally different. When I messaged a person from MYHB I was asked to send pictures. I was then told that since they were the same product but not same color that I needed to try to use them that they would not replace one. I’m pretty sure no one wants different color faucets on their vanity! Very disappointed and will not be buying from these people again. Customer service is crap! I would give them 0 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Paula T.

customer_reviews.title: Heads up, you get more than you bargained for!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is gorgeous, a nice weight, all of it. And I mean ALL of it... the thing is frigging huge! Not sure that’s gonna work in our motorhome bathroom, lol!! Huge.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Thurlow

customer_reviews.title: Loved this.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Easy to install and beautiful. Looks great with above counter sink
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaking
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these faucets and they worked great for about 2 years and now all of them are leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my diy bathroom countertop. It is perfect. It was packaged well, sturdy and looks good with an above counter sink.
customer_reviews.author: yulanda baldwin

customer_reviews.title: I adore this faucet
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is very handy and had no issues installing. I adore this faucet! So beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine&Jason

customer_reviews.title: damaged finish
customer_reviews.text: After only a few months installing this in our bathroom, a white ring has formed on the finish of the drain and no amount of cleaning can get it off. I think the finish itself is damaged/stained/has rubbed off. Very cheap and disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Holland Hill

customer_reviews.title: Definitely cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: The fact that this faucet has 4.5 star rating boggles my mind. How? Whenever you go to turn the water on, it squeaks. Then if you move it to cold or hot, the entire spout moves with it since it swivels "360°". Absolutely cheap quality. Sad we spent so much time installing only to have it be such poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Quality and function in addition to looks - could not be happier
customer_reviews.author: Mahalo P.

customer_reviews.title: Quality, good price and nice look!
customer_reviews.text: Good product! Well worth the price and looks great, too!
customer_reviews.author: Natural & Organic Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great product and looks very fancy
customer_reviews.text: Look the way it looks and haven’t had any issues with leaks noted in some of the other reviews. The swivel is really smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Water Pressure is too high, makes a mess
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice and install was easy. The water pressure is way to high for a vessel sink and makes a wet mess. I had to dial back the valve on the wall. There should be a flow restrictor, which i was unable to locate.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful high quality!
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect! The only downside is the ability to swivel.
customer_reviews.author: Keepuncher

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Finish Well made
customer_reviews.text: I haven't actually installed it yet but it looks beautiful and it looks very sturdy. It's all threaded fittings no silly little clips that you have to have a special tool undo.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality...ease of use...perfect in our new bathroom ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Cathie Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than what the description says
customer_reviews.text: Way too big, I measured numerous times before ordering. By the time I was ready to install it was too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Alison J.

customer_reviews.title: It is everything we wanted at a great price. Home depot and lowes want an arm ...
customer_reviews.text: It is everything we wanted at a great price. Home depot and lowes want an arm and a leg for a faucet compared to Amazon. Installation was a breeze however, parts were not labeled so I had to look just a bit more into which gaskets went first. Overall we are extremely happy with our purchase. Well be saving now to buy several more of these faucets.
customer_reviews.author: Noemy Resendiz

customer_reviews.title: We ordered 2
customer_reviews.text: We loved the first one so much that we ordered another one.

customer_reviews.title: Great faucet
customer_reviews.text: We replaced a similar faucet that constantly had cartridge and leaking problems. This Faucet is very nice looking and works like a dream. It operates smoothly and we don't have any pressure issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Faucet
customer_reviews.text: The faucet is pretty but the drain cover is tarnishing. I contacted the company and no response. Update—-they contacted me and sent me a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Ily

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I purchased 2 for our master bath to go with vessel sinks that I also purchased on here. Easy instal and look beautiful. Great water pressure out of these also.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Hoefer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: Very please with quality of the faucet. My husband and I have been to several big box stores and we needed a certain length for our counter top, this is perfect. I can wait to install it.
customer_reviews.author: Hildie

customer_reviews.title: Just lovely!
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect! I love the drain style and it matches our bathroom style. The height was exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: CountryGirl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful faucet, great value
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous faucet. Initially sent with the wrong drain (overflow instead of non-overflow) but Amazon customer service quickly resolved that and sent the correct drain. Easy to install, no leaks, looks beautiful. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Hilary P.

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My hubby the plumber never heard of this brand...but after installing it and using it were convinced that it's a great brand! Exceeded expectations across the board! Very sturdy with great pressure!!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Lahiff

customer_reviews.title: Qualtity
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these for our kitchen sinks. These are great. We have had no issues at all. They have been installed for about two years. We will use these again in our new home.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Sheron

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as discribed! Easy installation! Beautiful product. Well packaged. Buy with confidence!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Nice faucet
customer_reviews.text: I love this faucet. My only complaint is when I turn on the water a very strong chemical smell comes out with the water. I have to run the water for a few minutes to get the smell out. Hoping that this goes away with time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the bronze. Great value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit with our vessel sinks. Great price. Works great
customer_reviews.author: kkt

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: High quality and stunning to look at ...100% loving it! This is a no brainer...you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mdarmo

customer_reviews.title: Very classy and easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, very easy to install and awesome price for an expensive, classy look!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Drain isn’t long enough to fit through my counter tops
customer_reviews.text: The drain isn’t long enough to go through my counter tops so I can’t tighten the nut. I don’t even have very thick counters.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Time will tell but first impression is that it was a good buy. Installation was easy and worked. Quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: frank canales jr

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Replaced 2 very expensive PriceFisher fsucets in bathroom that never worked properly. These work great . Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stratemann

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: The body leaked, thus worthless within 2 weeks of installing. The company also makes it impossible to replace or redeem warranty. I don’t recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and easy to install!! Looks great in our bath remodel!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Best facet
customer_reviews.text: This the best facet I've ever bought Good water flowing and elegant look
customer_reviews.author: hope

customer_reviews.title: It looks pretty, It dispenses water.
customer_reviews.text: It looks pretty, It dispenses water. That's it's job, it does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: but love the look of it
customer_reviews.text: Haven't installed it yet, but love the look of it.
customer_reviews.author: kct

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and quality!
customer_reviews.text: The quality and look of this is A+ Shipped fast and looks great in our powder room!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when we remodeled our bathroom and it was the perfect touch to our bronze shower knobs and fixtures!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily thrasher

customer_reviews.title: GREAT faucet. I bought 2 of these for my ...
customer_reviews.text: GREAT faucet. I bought 2 of these for my vessel sinks in the master bath and they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Mich5449

customer_reviews.title: Well built!
customer_reviews.text: Great look. very sturdy. I just wish the instructions were a little more detailed for us non plumbers. Everything is metal unlike the plastic piece of chinese garbage I just removed.
customer_reviews.author: Don J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great faucet for bathroom sink. I love it!! Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: carol aruck

customer_reviews.title: Great looking faucet
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this faucet.. I haven’t installed it yet but it is a nice heavy faucet...?and love the look.. will post pics when installed...
customer_reviews.author: Jeanbean

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the whole recommended faucet and overflow. Happy with the faucet and not happy with the quality of the overflow and it look easy, but it was not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The faucet was exactly as described. We've been using it for about two months and its working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is a LARGE faucet, perfect for our 6" tall vessel sink. We love the faucet, works perfectly! Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: JadeOli

customer_reviews.title: Nice design
customer_reviews.text: Nice design but not the quality I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Watson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful faucet.
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is beautiful. Fits perfectly over my vessel sink. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: William benn

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! I love this faucet. It seems very sturdy and very well made. I freaking love that the spout swivels!
customer_reviews.author: DevonManwell

customer_reviews.title: Quality! And appealing!
customer_reviews.text: I picked it out based on looks but husband gives it a 5 star rating as well on craftsmanship! And it was so reasonable! Great quality, great appearance!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Langdale

customer_reviews.title: Faucet leaked when installed. It leaked inside the faucet ...
customer_reviews.text: Faucet leaked when installed. It leaked inside the faucet. No way to repair. Return window closed in one month before it was installed. Very very dissatisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Davonne Davis

product_meta.title: MYHB 360° Swivel Oil Rubbed Bronze Bathroom Vessel Sink Faucet with POP UP Drain Single Handle Lever Bowl Tap Mixer
feature_bullets: Vessel Faucet height 12.6", Spout Height: 9", Spout Reach:5.5" , full-brass construction faucets for vessel sinks
cUPC certificated ceramic cartridge with a never leak guarantee
Include pop up drain with no overflow and cUPC certificated 304 stainless steel hoses in US standard
360° swivel spout for more conveniently use
Body tube detachable enable this bathroom faucet for both vessel sink and vanity sink use

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars587 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
